website_summaries.verdict: Works great as a practice or game cricket bat for someone just starting to play.
pros: Offers a precise design and shape for the best performance
Uses top-quality materials in the construction to ensure a long lifespan and durability
cons: Not really made for high-level games

customer_reviews.title: Very Fragile Bat
customer_reviews.text: Made with very low quality material. I was using this bat for hard tennis ball with is suggested in the product description. Used it for couple of matches and handle got separated from the body part. Din't even last for a day. The rubber grip was loose as well it stated to come out as we played. In summary would not recommend it go for other options.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: You've Got Red on You
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Halloween. The decals peeled off pretty easily, then I sanded and stained it. Perfect Shaun of the Dead
customer_reviews.author: Melissa McCauley

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: When I pulled the bat out of the box, and it was in boxes within boxes (inception style) I thought it looked like a nice piece of equipment. Upon further inspection, it was found that this was not the case. There were 2 areas that were damaged, as you can see in the pictures above. Very disappointed in the product, will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Bat broke on the first game.
customer_reviews.text: This bat broke on the first game. Terrible product. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality; poor service; worst decision
customer_reviews.text: BEFORE BUYING CONTACT ME AND I CAN SEND PICTURES OF THIS BAT (BROKEN WITHIN A MONTH) TO YOU. This was one of the worst decisions. I ordered two bats. First one broke (the handle portion) in two weeks. I reported this to the seller and he promised me to replace it but he did not. He does not reply to any of my emails now. After two more weeks the second one broke in a similar way. I sent him photographs too. So money wasted and as it was for a college association we had a lot of trouble.
customer_reviews.author: raj

customer_reviews.title: I would say good Bat for a price
customer_reviews.text: I would say good Bat for a price! 1. Was looking for a ad-hoc bat tp practice my drills before my preferred bat comes. Given price iI would say it is good bat to have. Pings the ball off okay. 2. Profile full (With Curve / stroke) 3. Looks like a single tennis ball bat. I wont be comfortable playing for hard tennis 4. Weight 1091g to be precise. 5. Pick up is bad but wont be expecting that from this bat
customer_reviews.author: Saurabh Sawant

customer_reviews.title: Great for not-Cricket stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great for a Shawn of the Dead costume or for home security against strange noises or mailmen who get too close.
customer_reviews.author: JehTosef

customer_reviews.title: Using it with the lawn tennis ball
customer_reviews.text: Works great with the lawn tennis ball. I have not tried it with a leather ball.
customer_reviews.author: Gaurav Aryal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Casey Jones or Sean of the Dead
customer_reviews.text: The labels peeled off really easily. I was able to sand it with some 60 grit that removed all of the adhesive very quickly. A little bit of mini wax espresso stain and silver duct tape and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Fuller

customer_reviews.title: bad grip and little heavy
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this bat. 2 things i did not like. 1st one is grip is really bad quality. Second this bat is on a little heavier side. I am not sure if this is a standard size but the width of this bat kind of very smaller then i have another bat. I guess you can not beat the price i only paid $34.99. If they would have put nice quality Grip i would have given them 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: Najia Farhan

customer_reviews.title: Not for serious games
customer_reviews.text: Made for kids. Stay away if you are an adult.

customer_reviews.title: Not a properly finished bat
customer_reviews.text: The bat had a crack. The wood has been polished so the crack is not seen. I think so for the price bat is too expensive.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This product is in very poor quality. Broked upon playing single game. I DO NOT RECOMMAND for the buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Madhav Pokhrel

customer_reviews.title: Bad Bat
customer_reviews.text: Read the good reviews and bought the bat. It arrived late due to shipping error but the people threw in the leather ball for free. Unfinished Bat. Critical info missing on ad is edge is only 26mm in width approximately. A good bat will be between 40mm-47mm edge width. When it arrived did the oil and knocking took about 5 Days, took it to test out in an hour of using it cracked from should area below the handle. Very Dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Syed Shafi

customer_reviews.title: Loose handle and a heavy bat.
customer_reviews.text: The bat is too heavy for use with hard tennis nivia cricket balls. The handle became loose during the first use itself. Returning the bat for refund. Thanks to Amazon prime!
customer_reviews.author: bronco_fan

customer_reviews.title: Great Cricket bat
customer_reviews.text: Great bat! Gets a lot of use on our property! Well made, solid and durable! My kids love it!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bat!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bat!!!! This bat is perfectly balanced and great bat for tennis ball cricket large profile with thick edges; excellent for power play and my whole team loves this bat and this one makes me look good.
customer_reviews.author: Praveen

customer_reviews.title: Good for hard tennis ball.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. I like it so far. Light weight and it gets the job done. Fast shipping.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bat for Tennis Ball Cricket !!!
customer_reviews.text: Writing this review after using it for almost a month. It's been long time I got perfect bat for tennis ball cricket, my whole team loved it, will definitely recommend this for tennis ball cricket lovers.

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: This bat broke at the handle within a week of light use. Not recommended to purchase

customer_reviews.title: This is more of young kids bat to play tennis balls
customer_reviews.text: This is just a tennia ball bat. Used it for 2 days doesn't have good stroke.

customer_reviews.title: Bat is designed for adult.
customer_reviews.text: Family Fun day cricket match. Professional looking at with slight curve, greay weight not to heavy and definitely sized for adults.

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I don't even consider this as a bat... The handle is also not a real cricket bat handle.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality Used Bat
customer_reviews.text: The bat came little bit damaged. Haven't started using it. The blade of the bat seems used as well. I see alot of dents on the front and side.

customer_reviews.title: Bat Handle wearing off after one game
customer_reviews.text: Bat handle started to come off after playing only one game, I wish they make better products.

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: It did not last long only a couple of days play and the handle came out, i wouldn't recomend it

customer_reviews.title: It should be little cheaper though.
customer_reviews.text: It's light and help you to hit 6s easily. The grip start ripping too soon.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the bat is good. Thought the bat is neither heavy nor light, its balanced weight and curvature suits those who prefer light weight bat to play cricket with soft tennis ball.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This item was exactly what I wanted. I had some questions about my order and they were super prompt and polite in answering my questions. The item arrived EARLY and well packaged. I couldn't ask for more.

customer_reviews.title: Decent Bat.
customer_reviews.text: Decent bat to play with Soft Tennis ball. The wood is decent and it has good power too. Worth for the price. * Note, The handle sticker says "Made in India".

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bat a few weeks ago, and seasoned it well and played exactly two games and the bat handle became very loose. Now the bat is used as a runners bat. We play for club and tried to have a cheap bat for net and outdoor practice. The bat broke in nets. I wouldn't recommend this bat as the wood is good quality but the finishing of the product is absolutely horrible resulting damages such as the handle being broken....

customer_reviews.text: Very good study bat. makes a good sound when hitting ball

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Products
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Willow bat along with balls and wickets for the employees working here in Iraq supporting the military. this equipment was well received and is being used daily to get their exercise. I will gladly purchase items again for the morale of the employees in the future. Fast delivery and all items arrived undamaged.

customer_reviews.title: Used it with hard tennis ball... Didint ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it with hard tennis ball...Didint last for too long...bottom of the handle started showing cracks after some 20 overs...We had to discard the bat soon after as the handle started to come off....For this price range it is expected i guess..
customer_reviews.author: RagsT

customer_reviews.title: Works as a prop.
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer: I don't play cricket, and won't use this in any actual sports. I bought this as a prop for a Casey Jones (TMNT) cosplay. Suppose it would also work for a Shaun of the Dead costume. I don't care for all the decals, but a few minutes with a razor blade fixed that. It's not too heavy, which is good for me as I will carry it around in a golf bag with the rest of my gear. I've never had another cricket bat, so I don't know how they compare. Cons: You gotta know what a crumpet is to understand cricket.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Mistler

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bat for tennis ball. The strokes are perfect. I say it's a worth the amount.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Waste...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I bought a bat online, I played with season ball before. This time I was participating in a tournament and I needed a good Bat to play the heavy duty tennis ball...I started practicing with this bat and i hardly hit the ball the hard. I felt that the bat was cracking at the handle...when i look at the handle it is already gone...waste of money...Not at all a good bat.
customer_reviews.author: Drama

customer_reviews.title: Good Bat Bad Grip
customer_reviews.text: The bat is good, you will have to oil it and knock it in when it comes. However, the grip is of bad quality. The grip tore after a couple of uses.
customer_reviews.author: CarbonFiberFreak

customer_reviews.title: It's light in weight but doesn't seem sturdy. My husband is hesitant to use it for ...
customer_reviews.text: It's light in weight but doesn't seem sturdy. My husband is hesitant to use it for practice matches everyday as it might not withstand even if they play with a tennis ball! Should have got him a better one but had a constarint on the budget! :(
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Great Bat with Great Service!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought my husband this bat for his birthday. He instantly fell in love with it. The bat shipped very fast and I had to hide it for over a month lol. The bat is excellent quality and we have had so many positive comments on it and we have referred many people here to buy their own. My husband is in the US Army and alot of people that have played the game couldn't believe how good the quality was for the price. I look forward to buying another in the future for myself to learn to play against him!! Thank you for the great customer service and excellent bat!!
customer_reviews.author: shumate2004

customer_reviews.title: Good bat for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Good bat for a beginner (which I am) to practice with. Seems good quality, handle very easy to grip, good graphics.

customer_reviews.title: Never had a cricket bat before
customer_reviews.text: I did not buy this bat for Cricket, but my friends have used it for such. They like the weight of it, the grip, and the length. I initially bought this bat for Halloween, and it didn't come in time so now I use it for entertaining my dog.

customer_reviews.title: but it looks and feels excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it yet,but it looks and feels excellent quality

customer_reviews.title: Nice bat
customer_reviews.text: The bat was good. I used it with tennis ball. Very good quality; a little on the heavier side. I would recommend this bat to anyone looking for a good bat at a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: The product itself doesn't have much problem except a couple of small chipping on the edge. The packaging is bad, the box is flimsy and has holes on it, there is no cushioning materials in it, the bat is moving around and hitting the box.

customer_reviews.title: Not Good for Hard Tennis Ball

customer_reviews.title: Comes it's a crap ton of stickers on it which peel off easily ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Shaun of the Dead costume. This is a hefty bat. Comes it's a crap ton of stickers on it which peel off easily enough, but will leave a residue behind requiring sanding. Was super happy with the purchase. FYI, if you are going o stain the bat for a SOTD replica, you should know the wood takes stain really well, stick to an oak - I went to dark, and had to sand it out.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cory

customer_reviews.title: Use for Plumping Sofa Cushions
customer_reviews.text: My upholsterer suggested full size cricket bats for plumping the down and feathers in our sofa cushions and they work beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Another reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good bat with right power. Slight heavy but will last long playing with Hard Tennis ball !

customer_reviews.title: Chicks dig cricket bats.
customer_reviews.text: If you don't have a cricket bat in your house and there are any amount of hipster chicks in your city, you have made a blunder. These are like handmade puppets (how so?) in that they will make hipster chicks like you. I actually learned to play, just to really drive it home. This is in the USA by the way. Cricket is not popular.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Zirkle

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality bat - Don't buy - Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: Don't want to write much. All I can say is that this is waste of money. Instead get 'Old School' Reebok Striker Kashmir Willow Cricket Bat, Short Handle. I would say don't buy don't buy don't buy. If you still buy ........all the best.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it is
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for a Shawn of the Dead "zombie repellent" piece for our wall. While this probably wouldn't last against real zombies, works great for a life-size replica.

customer_reviews.title: bat is not at all good
customer_reviews.text: i brought bat recently from this store, picture what they have showed is no way near to bat they send to me. and coming to shipping while ordering bat they will say bat will be shipped in 2 to 4 day if you go for expedite shipping but i got my circket bat after 10 days.

customer_reviews.title: good quality

product_meta.title: Pro Impact Cricket Bat - Full Size, Lightweight & Strong - Ideal Training or Practice for Home or Club Play
feature_bullets: KASHMIR WILLOW CRICKET BAT. Used to hit a hard leather ball, this cricket bat is expertly crafted using Kashmir willow to provide long-lasting performance on the pitch. The bat should be knocked in before use with a mallet or a ball.

TENNIS BALL CRICKET BAT. Made of handcrafted wood, this cricket bat is designed to be used with a tennis cricket ball only (not recommended for leather balls). The handle is reinforced with firmly wound string and a rubber sleeve for increased durability.

COMFORTABLE RUBBER GRIP. The cricket bat is easy to grip and hold, thanks to a high-quality rubber sleeve. Offering extra comfort when holding the bat, this handle allows for longer practice sessions time and time again.

EXCLUSIVE SHAPE. For optimal performance, the cricket bat boasts a unique shape which delivers superb pick-up. As such, the bat feels lighter than it actually is, allowing for better control when swinging and hitting.

LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN. Weighing in at only three pounds, these Pro Impact Cricket Bats are lightweight yet durable. Both bats come in a full adult size, making them perfect for club usage or individual practice.
